basics.name: Mimi the Cat
basics.label: Domestic Entity (Feline)
basics.summary: A small four-legged being of uncertain origin, widely acknowledged as the primary authority within the household and a known disruptor of linear time, sleep cycles, and free will.

work.name: Primary Residence
work.summary: Responsible for monitoring all human activities, enforcing feeding schedules, and supervising laptop usage. Frequently interrupts work to demand worship.

volunteer.summary: Voluntarily sacrifices silence between 2:00â€“5:00 AM to ensure humans remain alert and spiritually unsettled.

awards.title: Most Innocent Looking Criminal
awards.summary: Awarded for committing acts of destruction while maintaining an expression of absolute purity.

publications.name: On the Sudden Appearance of Zoomies
publications.summary: An observational study documenting spontaneous high-speed movement with no identifiable cause.

references.name: The Human
references.reference: She owns me. I tolerate her.

projects.name: Operation Knock Everything Off
projects.summary: A long-term research project investigating whether objects truly belong on surfaces.
